name: SSF7
title: Site-Specific Factor 7
subtitle: Chromosome 8q Status
notes:
**Note 1:**  Genetic abnormalities in the long arm of chromosome 8 (8q) are associated with ocular melanomas.

**Note 2:**  A gain in chromosomes may also be termed "multiple copies" or "greater than normal."
